description: The backend deployment job (`TASK-103-03`) requires a secure authentication method, which is provided by the Workload Identity Federation setup (`TASK-102-01`).
mitigation_plan: Prioritize `TASK-102-01` and its validation to unblock all deployment-related tasks.
impact_if_delayed: Entire CI/CD setup and all subsequent development sprints will be blocked.

description: The Tenant Registration UI (`TASK-001-01`) cannot be fully tested or completed until the backend `registerOrganization` function (`TASK-001-03`) it calls is implemented.
mitigation_plan: Define and agree on the API contract (inputs, outputs, error codes) for the function at the beginning of the sprint to allow parallel development.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the completion of the first core user journey.

description: The Supervisor's Pending Approvals UI (`TASK-049-ACW-LIST-UI`) is useless until there is data to display, which is generated by the Subordinate Check-In task (`TASK-040-CAW-CHECKIN`).
mitigation_plan: Plan these stories in consecutive sprints as a feature workflow. Use manually seeded data in the emulator for UI development if needed.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire approval workflow feature.
